headline: 2025-11-03 — ArXiv research team published an analysis that examined 5 years of state-of-the-art machine-learning models for cyberattack detection (analyzed 5 years of literature).

2025-11-03 — ArXiv paper authors called for an investigation into the 'mix performance' of the Naive Bayes classifier, flagging 1 classifier (Naive Bayes) for targeted follow-up evaluation across reviewed studies.

2025-11-04 — ArXiv research team reported that current machine-learning approaches reviewed cannot detect an already-compromised database with SQL injection, indicating effectively 0% reliable detection for compromised-DB SQLi in the surveyed literature.
2025-11-05 — Canadian pediatric tertiary-care hospitals responded to a national survey: 18 hospitals replied, a 100% response rate (18 hospitals, 100% response rate).
2025-11-05 — Of the 18 surveyed hospitals, 13 had pediatric-specific massive hemorrhage protocol (MHP) content (13 MHPs; 72.2%).
